items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js library that simplifies JWT authentication. Provides methods for password hashing, token generation, route protection, and token refresh. Ideal for integrating JWT with Mongoose schemas.
items.title: imabhinavdev/easy-jwt-auth: A lightweight Node.js library that simplifies JWT authentication. Provides methods for password hashing, token generation, route protection, and token refresh. Ideal for integrating JWT with Mongoose schemas.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.
items.title: mini-360/LinkShortner: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.

items.content_html: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
items.title: VSG-EMEA/vsge-language-switcher: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
